Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: User management involves a lot of tasks, ranging from configuring default user preferences to setting up organizational units and assigning roles and groups to users; not to forget about permission handling. How to manage users is - at least partly - covered in several topics.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Get an overview of the various facets of user management.

Link.LinkText: User management is mostly done via the administration view - get information on the view here.
